title: i want legacy back
body:
can we have a choice with the clients? cause the new one is not good at all if anything its so much worse for some of us,
buggs out to much, comes up with black screens and champ select and then says you dodged when there was nothing you could do, made my whole pc crash (to this day i have no idea how)
and its way to slow, i can run a game that my pc shouldnt be able to play and get that faster than the new client
ok calming down hahahaha
i just would like to save most of the problems by just staying on the old client
so is there anyway of getting the old one back cause this new client is just making more and more problems

replies.body:
thanks for the help guys but its still not working properly, i did a full reset to my pc did the low spec and everything... and the first game after that i had almost 5 seconds to pick my champ or i was put down as afk :/ 
i never had problems with league till this client, this is gonna push me away from my favorite game cause its almost not playable :(
btw my pc can handle games like tera, blade and soul etc on full settings with 80 fps but cant run league client properly xD

Turn on low spec mode.
Run a client repair.
Update your graphics drivers.
Reinstall League.

These problems are not native to the client itself (as evidenced by the majority that have no issues with the client) nor are most of them caused by low spec machines. These kind of problems are native to your client specifically (as in the version of the client on your PC).
dude the client is in beta or alpha

> [{quoted}](name=DBmaster,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sIZxTPMg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-04-17T07:35:59.375+0000)
>
> dude the client is in beta or alpha

no, it's not.
when it was in alpha, people had to apply to use it.
when it was in  beta, we had the choice of the legacy client or the new one.
now that it's no longer in beta, they're removed the option for the legacy client.
would be nice too have an option tho

Unfortunately no, the old client is gone and never coming back. If you're having difficulty running the new client make sure to enable "Low spec mode" in the options and "Close client during game" if that still doesn't help. I have yet to experience any "black screens" or crashes so maybe you might just need to upgrade your pc or get a better one. If the client continues to be a pain your only option would be to either suck it up or find another game.

As part of phase 2 of Riot's plan to roll out the new client, the legacy client has been turned off for everyone in OCE and is no longer accessible. Not sure where you have been for the past week...

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-client-rollout-phase-2
